detectors.description: Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#215-246) uses a weak PRNG: random % 2 == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#235)

Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#215-246) uses a weak PRNG: ticketB == ticketA (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#233)

Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#215-246) uses a weak PRNG: ticketB == ticketA (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#223)

Lottery.arrangeRewards(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#215-246) uses a weak PRNG: random % jackpotN == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#226)

HasRandom._random() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#17-28) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender,_randomNonce ++,block.timestamp))) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x71f0afd597d1d594b57dd01a090eb64378999ea4-Lottery.sol#18-27)
